name: cyble-vision
label: Cyble Vision
description: Integration that enables users to access and enrich Indicators of Compromise (IOCs) from Cyble's TAXII Feed service within their environment.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.description: The URL of the Cyble Vision server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.
fields.tooltip: Specify the URL of the Cyble Vision server to which you will connect and perform automated operations.
fields.name: server_url

fields.title: Token
fields.description: The token used to access the Cyble Vision APIs and perform the automated operations.
fields.tooltip: Specify the token used to access the Cyble Vision server to which you will connect and perform automated operations.
fields.name: token

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description:
Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. 
By default, this option is set as True.

operations.title: Fetch Indicators
operations.description: Retrieves indicators based on the start time, end time and other parameters that you have specified.

parameters.title: IOC value
parameters.name: ioc
parameters.tooltip: A string representing the IoC to query for.
parameters.description: A string representing the IoC to query for

parameters.title: Type
parameters.name: type
parameters.tooltip: Specify the type for which the indicators to retrieve. e.g. CIDR, CVE, domain, email, FileHash-IMPHASH, FileHash-MD5, FileHash-PEHASH, FileHash-SHA1, FileHash-SHA256, FilePath, hostname, IPv4, IPv6, Mutex, NIDS, URI, URL, YARA, osquery, Ja3, Bitcoinaddress, Sslcertfingerprint.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the type for which the indicators to retrieve from Cyble Vision. e.g. CIDR, CVE, domain, email, FileHash-IMPHASH, FileHash-MD5, FileHash-PEHASH, FileHash-SHA1, FileHash-SHA256, FilePath, hostname, IPv4, IPv6, Mutex, NIDS, URI, URL, YARA, osquery, Ja3, Bitcoinaddress, Sslcertfingerprint.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: limit
parameters.tooltip: The maximum number of results to return. Default value is 10.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the maximum number of records that this operation should return. Default value is 10.

parameters.title: Order
parameters.name: order
parameters.tooltip: string indicating the order of the results. It can be asc for ascending or desc for descending. Optional, defaults to asc.
parameters.description: string indicating the order of the results. It can be asc for ascending or desc for descending. Optional, defaults to asc.

parameters.title: Sort By
parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.tooltip: A string indicating the field to sort based on the columns confident_rating, risk_rating, last_seen, and first_seen. Optional.
parameters.description: A string indicating the field to sort based on the columns confident_rating, risk_rating, last_seen, and first_seen. Optional.

parameters.title: Start Time
parameters.name: begin
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the start date and time from when to retrieve the indicators from Cyble Vision.
parameters.description: Specify the start date and time from when to retrieve the indicators from Cyble Vision.

parameters.title: End Time
parameters.name: end
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the end date and time till when to retrieve the list of executed reports from Cyble Vision.
parameters.description: Specify the end date and time till when to retrieve the list of executed reports from Cyble Vision.

operations.title: Fetch Alerts
operations.description: Retrieves alerts based on the start time, end time, limit, offset other parameters that you have specified.

parameters.title: Company ID
parameters.name: companyID
parameters.tooltip: company UUID registered on Cyble Vision

parameters.title: Sort by
parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.tooltip: The order by which you want to sort the alerts.

parameters.title: Start Time
parameters.name: begin
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the start date and time from when to retrieve the alerts from Cyble Vision.

parameters.title: End Time
parameters.name: end
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the end date and time till when to retrieve the list of alerts from Cyble Vision.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: limit
parameters.tooltip: The maximum number of results to return. Default value is 50.

parameters.title: From
parameters.name: from
parameters.tooltip: Starting date range for which advisories should be retrieved.

parameters.title: To
parameters.name: to
parameters.tooltip: End date range for which advisories should be retrieved.

parameters.title: Sort By
parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.tooltip: The field to sort the advisories by. Possible values: publish_date.

parameters.title: Order
parameters.name: order
parameters.tooltip: The order in which advisories should be sorted. Possible values: asc (ascending), desc (descending). Default: desc.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: limit
parameters.tooltip: The maximum number of advisories to retrieve per request. Default: 10.

parameters.title: Page
parameters.name: page
parameters.tooltip: The page number of the results to retrieve. Default: 1.

parameters.title: Custom Tags
parameters.name: customTags
parameters.tooltip: Custom tags to filter advisories. Commas can separate multiple values.

parameters.title: Countries
parameters.name: countries
parameters.tooltip: Countries to filter advisories. Commas can separate multiple values.

parameters.title: Vulnerabilities
parameters.name: vulnerabilities
parameters.tooltip: Vulnerabilities to filter advisories. Commas can separate multiple values.

operations.title: Get advisory details
operations.description: Get advisory details using Advisory ID

parameters.title: Advisory ID
parameters.name: advisoryID
parameters.tooltip: Get advisory details using Advisory ID

operations.title: Fetch Companies
operations.description: To retrieve users for company using the API endpoint.

operations.title: Fetch IP Details
operations.description: retrieve detailed information about an IP address, including domain information, geolocation, SSL details, risk assessment, and more.

parameters.title: company Id
parameters.name: companyId
parameters.tooltip: the Company UUID - Cyble Vision registered companies

parameters.title: Alert ID
parameters.name: alertID
parameters.tooltip: The unique identifier of the alert for which you want to add comments

parameters.title: Comment
parameters.name: comment
parameters.tooltip: An optional parameter for creating a new comment. Use this parameter to specify the comment content you want to add to the alert.

operations.title: Fetch CVE Details
operations.description: Retrieve Common Vulnerability and Exposure (CVE) details

parameters.title: CVE ID
parameters.name: cve
parameters.tooltip: CVE identifier for the specific vulnerability you want to retrieve details for.
